title: Five-Star Waterfront Luxury in Cape Town
description: Holiday like a celebrity staying in absolute five-star luxury on Cape Town’s stunning V&A Waterfront. Stay six days/five nights in an elegant Luxury Room at Cape Grace and receive a two-course dinner with complimentary bottle of wine at the fine-dining Signal Restaurant, four rounds of tapas and a cocktail each at the stylish Bascule Bar and a 30-minute spa therapy for two adults.
offer_address: W Quay Rd, V & A Waterfront, Cape Town, 8002, South Africa

title: Lavish Waterfront Escape in the Heart of the City
description: Opened by Nelson Mandela in 1997, the waterfront Table Bay Hotel Cape Town balances Victorian extravagance and contemporary chic bringing you a five-star escape in the heart of South Africa’s oldest-and arguably most beautiful-city. Feel like royalty with striking sea or Table Mountain views and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a decadent three-course dinner for two and a welcome bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: Quay, 6 W Quay Rd, V & A Waterfront, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Five-Star Executive Lounge Access in the Heart of Cape Town
description: From Table Mountain to the V&A Waterfront and nearby Stellenbosch wine country, discover everything breathtaking Cape Town has to offer with a five-star stay in the heart of the city at Hilton Cape Town. Includes daily breakfast, exclusive Executive Lounge access with daily drinks and snacks, nightly drinks and canapes and a refreshing welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: 126 Buitengracht St, Cape Town City Centre, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Five-Star Hilton Stay in the Heart of Cape Town with Executive Lounge Access
description: From Table Mountain to the V&A Waterfront and nearby Stellenbosch wine country, discover everything breathtaking Cape Town has to offer with a five-star stay in the heart of the city at Hilton Cape Town. Your exquisite Hilton escape includes daily breakfast, exclusive Executive Lounge access with daily drinks and snacks, nightly drinks and canapes and a refreshing welcome drink on arrival, plus a 10% discount on food and drinks at any of the hotel's restaurants and bars.
offer_address: 126 Buitengracht St, Cape Town City Centre, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Stunning Table Mountain Views at One & Only Cape Town
description: Experience absolute five-star luxury at One&Only Cape Town, located on the stunning V&A Waterfront. Whether it’s a pre or post-safari treat or just a chance to unwind and experience South Africa, enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one romantic dinner and one afternoon tea for two, one daily drink per person and a 20% discount at the fabulous on-site spa, located on its very own island. Plus, up to two children aged 16 and under stay free of charge, with breakfast and kids’ club access included.
offer_address: Dock Road, V & A Waterfront, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Five-Star Executive Lounge Access in the Heart of Cape Town
description: From Table Mountain to the V&A Waterfront and nearby Stellenbosch wine country, discover everything breathtaking Cape Town has to offer with a five-star stay in the heart of the city at Hilton Cape Town. Includes daily breakfast, exclusive Executive Lounge access with daily drinks and snacks, nightly drinks and canapes, private check-in and check-out and daily food and beverage credits.
offer_address: 126 Buitengracht St, Cape Town City Centre, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Cape Town City Centre
title: Stylish Cape Town Stay in the Heart of the City Centre
description: Experience the perfect combination of heritage and cosmopolitan living at Holiday Inn Express Cape Town City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Located in the heart of the city, let Cape Town's awe-inspiring landscape be the backdrop to your activities: you'll be within easy reach of Table Mountain, and the Victoria & Alfred Waterfront, as well as endless porcelain sands that frame this sun-kissed city. After busy days sit out on the hotel's terrace with a chilled beverage of choice and watch the world go by.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Cape Town City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 101 St. George's Mall, Cape Town 8001, South Africa

title: Cape Town Five-Star Secluded Cliffside Luxury at the Foot of Table Mountain
description:
Dramatically poised on the shimmering shoreline of the Atlantic Ocean, flanked by the staggeringly beautiful Table Mountain and Twelve Apostles range, The Twelve Apostles Hotel and Spa offers five-star cliffside luxury as the wonders of South Africa unfurl before you. High-end shopping and fine dining at the nearby V&A Waterfront complex beckon, or check out the renowned onsite Azure Restaurant, Café Grill and Leopard Bar. Indulge in the finest local and international cuisine or drop in for evening drinks, known as “sundowners” by the locals.

Come for the visual feast and iridescent sunsets of this enviable cliffside location and stay for the restorative holistic spa, heated infinity pool and silver-screen moments in the private cinema. Get lost in the magnificence of nearby adventures, from hiking at Maclear's Beacon to the stunning views at Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden and Robben Island museum. A haven of luxury, this breathtaking resort ensures every moment will be one to remember.
location_description: The Twelve Apostles Hotel and Spa
offer_address: Victoria Street, Camps Bay, Cape Town, 8005, South Africa

title: Five-Star Heritage Mansion Retreat on Cape Town's Atlantic Seaboard with Spa, Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description: Journey to this boutique Cape Town escape at Ellerman House, a beacon of sophistication perched on the slopes of Lion's Head. This historic mansion, now a world-class hotel, offers breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean from every elegant corner. Explore the vibrant Victoria & Albert Waterfront, dine at the city's top restaurants, or visit the nearby Table Mountain. Back at the hotel, savour the finest South African wines in the cellar, with over 9,000 labels to browse. Admire the country's most extensive private art collection, unwind in the sumptuous spa, dine on flavourful South African cuisine and catch a sensational sunset with a cocktail in hand - all from the comfort of this exquisite cliffside retreat.
offer_address: 180 Kloof Road, Bantry Road, Cape Town 8060, South Africa

title: Top-Rated Bantry Bay Escape near Beachfront in the Heart of Cape Town
description:
Discover Cape Town's spellbinding sights with a stay fit for nobility at President Hotel, a grand property ranked in the top 10% hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor. Enjoy three world-class restaurants and two bars to dine in, take a dip in the infinity pool, which overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and Lion's Head, and indulge in a pampering treatment at Placecol Spa.

Cape Town offers a wealth of sites waiting to be explored. Head to Table Mountain, where a cable car will deliver you right to the summit for breathtaking city views. For a dose of sunshine, Clifton Beach is an easy three-minute drive away, while the renowned V&A Waterfront, abuzz with live music, market stalls and dining venues, is a swift 10-minute drive away.
offer_address: 4 Alexander Rd, Bantry Bay, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Five-Star One&Only Cape Town Waterfront Resort with Table Mountain Views
description: Experience a stay to remember at the five-star One&Only Cape Town Resort - perfectly positioned alongside the fashionable Victoria & Alfred Waterfront and framed by the spectacular Table Mountain. This vibrant resort offers everything you need, including world-class Japanese-Peruvian fare at Africa’s first Nobu restaurant, an impressive infinity-edge pool, a dedicated KidsOnly programme, plus a sprawling island spa in the middle of the resort. Admire the legendary Table Mountain from this haven, then explore further afield with restorative yoga classes and tours with an expert mountain guide (surcharges apply) or dive into the sparkling beaches of Cape Town, with shimmering azure waters and sensational sunset views.
offer_address: Victoria & Alfred Waterfront, Cape Town, 8001, South Africa

title: Elegant Cape Town Oasis in V&A Waterfront with Outdoor Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Experience the magic of Cape Town with a stay at this five-star retreat, perfectly positioned in the city's vibrant V&A Waterfront district. Here, you'll find yourself surrounded by the city's finest dining, shopping and entertainment venues, all set against the backdrop of the majestic Table Mountain and glittering Atlantic Ocean.

After a day of exploring, return to this luxurious haven and savour a tipple at the speakeasy-inspired Bascule Bar, enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or indulge in a pampering treatment at Fairmont Spa. Don't miss the opportunity to explore the nearby Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa, or take a scenic drive along the stunning Chapman's Peak Drive.
location_description: Cape Grace, A Fairmont Managed Hotel
offer_address: West Quay Road, Victoria & Alfred Waterfront, Cape Town 8001, South Africa
